name: The Only Way Is Us
description:
A game-jam-like exam in which we had to follow a theme and respect the chosen diversifiers during the whole development process.

Theme

"What do we do now?"

Diversifiers

The Ancient Folk: The game must include ancient traditions and locations of a community.

Thomas Wasn't Alone: Use only simple shapes to represent every single element inside the game.

Palidrome: The game story must end the same way it began.

Comic Book Colors: Your game uses only 4 colors, with emphasis on contrast.

Andrea Buzzi

Game Programmer, Game Designer

Francesco Goi

Game & Level Designer, Sound Designer

Giovanni Mancini

Game Programmer, Game Designer

Morgana Morandi

2D Artist,  Game & UI Designer
